scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "wait-on tcp:3001 && cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd ./server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.save: git add -A && git commit -m "ready for deploy"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run save && npm run push
